document_data.name: Aerlyse
document_data.mainbody: '''Aerlyse''' was a [[half-drow]] [[psion]] and a member of [[Bregan D'aerthe]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Only those with intelligence and charm could impress Aerlyse.
document_data.History:
Aerlyse was a student of [[Kimmuriel Oblodra]], the powerful [[psionic]] second-in-command of Bregan D'aerthe.

In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Aerlyse was sent along with other Bregan D'aerthe operatives to secure an encampment in the ruins of [[Castle Never]], and from there to explore the crypts and spy on the city of [[Neverwinter]]. In addition, Aerlyse had been given a special mission from Kimmuriel to spy on the captain of the Bregan D'aerthe camp, [[Xalbyn]], and did so dutifully.
